about_the_game:
Lunar New Year Book

This Lunar New Year-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Celebrate the Lunar New Year with Coloring Pixels!

Covering all New Year animals and a celebration of traditions!

Contents

The Lunar New Year book unlocks the following images:
  • Emperor Coins - 15x98
  • Firecrackers - 44x97
  • Dragon Dance - 46x50
  • Hóngbāo - 48x90
  • Year of the Pig - 49x42
  • Year of the Dog - 58x60
  • Year of the Rabbit - 60x82
  • Shou Sui - 70x105
  • Lanterns - 76x75
  • Gift of Luck - 84x72
  • Year of the Rooster - 88x79
  • Year of the Monkey - 90x83
  • Year of the Horse - 93x119
  • Year of the Rat - 94x96
  • Year of the Tiger - 100x100
  • Year of the Dragon - 109x140
  • Year of the Ox - 120x145
  • Year of the Snake - 130x160
  • Motif - 160x110
  • Year of the Goat - 160x160

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
